entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 09:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain or ice pellets in the morning then to rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
